entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:12 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 10:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa steady
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.2°C
Wind: S 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
